import React, {FC} from 'react' import { Card, CardActionArea, CardContent, CardMedia, IconButton, Typography, } from '@material-ui/core' import {WithT} from "i18next"; import {InnerCardData} from "@root/interfaces/CardData"; import Skeleton from '@material-ui/lab/Skeleton'; import {FavoriteIcon, DeliveryIcon, SafeIcon, SwapIcon} from '@src/components/elements/icons'; import {useStyles} from './useStyles' export const CardItem: FC = (props) => { const { t, isFetch, images, id, delivery, safe_deal, exchange, title, price, location, created_at, currency, ads_type } = props; const classes = useStyles(); return ( {isFetch ? :
{t(`common:${ads_type.mark}`)}
{!!delivery && ( )} {!!safe_deal && ( )} {!!exchange && ( )}
} {isFetch ? <>
: <> {title} {price} {currency.name} {location}
{created_at} } ) }
